title: Mr Fu Is Jealous Everyday After Marriage - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   College/University   Dancers   Engagement   Family   Jealousy   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Possessive Characters   Younger Love Interests
author: 偷馬頭   偷马头
description:
Fu Hengzhi married a petite wife who was twelve years younger than him, and from that moment on, he started a married life of struggle with fighting all kinds of little wolf dogs.

What kind of fate awaits him?

That’s something he has to find out along his long journey of life.>
